summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1628, for the improvement of West Fifty-second Street, in the City of Seattle, from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Eleventh Avenue Northwest, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, flush tanks, catch basins and other necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 17337 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
